mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(AUTHOR_GROUP_SN) + 1,1) AS AUTHOR_GROUP_SN FROM TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP ( AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_NM, USE_AT, GROUP_LEADER_AT, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{groupSn}, #{groupNm}, #{useAt}, #{emplyrSn}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR ( EMPLYR_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{emplyrSn}, #{groupSn}, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN GROUP_SN, --그룹일련번호 GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_NM GROUP_NM --그룹명 FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR PERSONAL, TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP GRP WHERE PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN AND GRP.USE_AT = 'Y' AND PERSONAL.EMPLYR_SN = #{emplyrSn} ORDER BY PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN
SELECT AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, COUNT(EMPLYR_SN) CNT FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn} GROUP BY AUTHOR_GROUP_SN
mapper.update: UPDATE TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP SET USE_AT = 'N', LAST_UPDUSR_SN = #{emplyrSn}, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
mapper.select: SELECT A.GROUP_SN, A.GROUP_NM, EMP.EMPLYR_NM, EMP.EMPLYR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM-1 NUM, PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN GROUP_SN, --그룹일련번호 GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_NM GROUP_NM, --그룹명 EMPLYR_SN FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR PERSONAL, TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP GRP WHERE PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = GRP.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN AND GRP.USE_AT = 'Y' AND PERSONAL.EMPLYR_SN = #{emplyrSn} ORDER BY PERSONAL.AUTHOR_GROUP_SN ) A, TCM_EMPLYR EMP WHERE EMP.EMPLYR_SN = A.EMPLYR_SN AND NUM = #{num}
SELECT COUNT(EMPLYR_SN) CNT FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
SELECT NVL2(MIN(GROUP_LEADER_SN), 'Y', 'N') LEADER_AT FROM TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP WHERE GROUP_LEADER_SN = #{emplyrSn} AND AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}

SELECT NVL(MIN(EMPLYR_SN), 'N') NEXT_LEADER_SN --없으면N, 존재하면 일련번호 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, EMPLYR_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT FROM TCM_EMPLYRBY_GROUP_AUTHOR WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn} ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_DT ) WHERE RNUM = 2
mapper.update: UPDATE TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP SET GROUP_LEADER_SN = #{nextLeaderSn}, LAST_UPDUSR_SN = #{emplyrSn}, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
UPDATE TCM_AUTHOR_GROUP --공유그룹 SET AUTHOR_GROUP_NM = #{data}, LAST_UPDUSR_SN = #{emplyrSn}, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
mapper.select: /* GroupDAO.selectFileSn */ SELECT TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(FILE_SN), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00000')) + 1 FILE_SN FROM TCM_GROUP_FILE WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
mapper.insert: /* IndexDAO.insertGroupFile */ INSERT INTO TCM_GROUP_FILE ( EMPLYR_SN, AUTHOR_GROUP_SN, FILE_SN, MAIN_FILE_AT, FILE_STRE_COURS_NM, --파일저장경로명 ORGINL_FILE_NM, --원본파일명 FRST_REGIST_DT, FRST_REGISTER_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN ) VALUES ( #{emplyrSn}, #{groupSn}, #{fileSn}, #{mainFileAt}, #{filePath}, #{orgFileNm}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{emplyrSn} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORGINL_FILE_NM FROM TCM_GROUP_FILE WHERE AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn} AND MAIN_FILE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE TCM_GROUP_FILE SET MAIN_FILE_AT = 'N', FRST_REGISTER_SN = #{emplyrSn}, FRST_REGIST_DT = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_SN = #{emplyrSn}, LAST_UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE MAIN_FILE_AT = 'Y' AND AUTHOR_GROUP_SN = #{groupSn}
mapper.select: SELECT TAD.FILE_STRE_COURS_NM, TAD.ORGINL_FILE_NM, TAD.FILE_NM FROM TCM_ATCHMNFL TA, TCM_ATCHMNFL_DETAIL TAD WHERE TA.ATCHMNFL_SN = TAD.ATCHMNFL_SN AND TA.FRST_REGISTER_SN = #{emplyrSn} AND TA.USE_AT = 'Y'
